frontmatter.name: Sudhanshu Dasgupta
frontmatter.bio: I am a software engineer experience in web development and design systems. As a maintainer of CNCF project Meshery and Layer5, I lead development efforts, mentor contributors, and create scalable, user-centric applications. I have a strong background in open-source collaboration, cloud-native technologies like Docker and Kubernetes, and community engagement. Passionate about simplifying complex technologies, I thrive in building solutions that empower users while fostering innovation and collaboration.
